headline.main: At U.N., Ambassadors Hold Auditions for Next Secretary General

keywords.value: United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: He or she will face daunting challenges, from stopping wars, to holding peacekeepers accountable for rape, to nudging governments to tackle climate change.
lead_paragraph: He or she will face daunting challenges, from stopping wars, to holding peacekeepers accountable for rape, to nudging governments to tackle climate change.
